name: Crew Neck Tee Shirt Mockup
description:
Front and back photorealistic mockup of the classic crew neck tee shirt (or t-shirt or t shirt or just shirt, whichever you prefer).

Includes highlights, midtones, and shadows layers; artwork layer with layer mask; and the original tee shirt layer. Includes all 91 options for American Apparel color choices, from 100% cotton, 50/50 Poly-Cotton, and tri-blend styles, including the pictured colors 50/50 Black Aqua and Tri-Cranberry. Two photoshop (.psd) files, 1100px x 1000px. For help extracting, try WinRAR or IZArc. Allow a couple hours for me to email you the files, I do it manually but it should be pretty quick overall.

description:

For help extracting, try WinRAR or IZArc. Allow a couple hours for me to email you the files, I do it manually but it should be pretty quick overall.
